Explore STEM Learning at Stembotics

Experience hands-on learning like never before! Our VEX IQ Learning Program engages students in exciting projects and challenges, igniting their curiosity and fostering creativity.
With collaborative environments and expert guidance, students embark on a journey of exploration and discovery.

Start Learning anytime from May to July

Dive into exciting projects and challenges designed to ignite curiosity and foster creativity.

Start Preparing for Competitions and Compete

Experience the thrill of competition as you test your skills against teams from around the region.

Do it again

Hone in your robotics skills every year and grow with your peers, achiving new highs every time.

VEX IQ Learning

  • Experience hands-on learning like never before!
  • Work alongside peers, sharing ideas and collaborating on solutions to real-world problems.
  • Benefit from expert instruction and mentorship, guiding you through every step of your learning journey.

VEX IQ Competitive

  • Join us for a thrilling adventure in robotics competition! In our VEX IQ Competitive Program, students test their skills against teams from around the region, developing strategic thinking and teamwork abilities along the way.
  • Develop strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities through challenging robotics competitions.
  • Learn the importance of teamwork and communication as you collaborate with your peers to achieve success.

FLL Plan

  • Unlock your potential with our FLL Plan Program!
  • Showcase your ideas with confidence through effective communication and presentation skills.

Empowering Future Innovators through STEM Education

Check out our programs

At Stembotics, we are dedicated to inspiring and educating the next generation of innovators in the world of STEM. Our programs provide hands-on learning experiences that cultivate creativity, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills.

Join us in shaping a brighter future through STEM education. Contact us to learn more about our programs and how you can get involved.
